transArray.content: The hotel is comfortable and clean

Dear guests, hello! Thank you for your recognition of the hotel. Under the epidemic, every room in the hotel is carefully cleaned and disinfected by housekeepers every day, so that every traveler can stay at ease. The hotel is also equipped with self-service food delivery robots and self-service The laundry room provides value-for-money services for your trip. We look forward to your visit again!
